// Pressing enter repeats the previous command.
// Note that godebug outputs a space after the prompt,
// which is included in the blank prompts here.

-> _ = "breakpoint"
(godebug) x
4
(godebug) 
4
(godebug) n
-> x = mul(x, x)
(godebug) 
-> if x == 4 {
(godebug) 
-> } else if n := 2; n == 3 {
(godebug) 
-> } else {
(godebug) 
-> fmt.Println("What's going on? x ==", x)
(godebug) 
What's going on? x == 16
